name: axc16nfALT
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnf(s2, w0))
-| wnf(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnf(s2, w0))
-| wnf(s2, wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))

|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnf(s2, w0))
-| wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(w0, wal(s2, w0)))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wnf(s2, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: Alternate proof of ~ axc16nf , shorter but requiring ~ ax-11 and ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
